mapper.sql: id, menu_name, menu_code, menu_path, menu_component,menu_redirect, menu_icon, menu_permission, menu_type, menu_parent_id, menu_sort, menu_visible, menu_status, delete_flag, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time
mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT m.menu_permission FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id AND rm.delete_flag = 0 INNER JOIN sys_role r ON rm.role_id = r.id AND r.role_status = 1 AND r.delete_flag = 0 INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id AND ur.delete_flag = 0 WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_status = 1 AND m.delete_flag = 0 AND m.menu_permission != ''

SELECT DISTINCT m.id, m.menu_name, m.menu_code, m.menu_path, m.menu_component, m.menu_redirect, m.menu_icon, m.menu_permission, m.menu_type, m.menu_parent_id, m.menu_sort, m.menu_visible, m.menu_status, m.create_time, m.update_time FROM sys_menu m INNER JOIN sys_role_menu rm ON m.id = rm.menu_id AND rm.delete_flag = 0 INNER JOIN sys_role r ON rm.role_id = r.id AND r.role_status = 1 AND r.delete_flag = 0 INNER JOIN sys_user_role ur ON r.id = ur.role_id AND ur.delete_flag = 0 WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.menu_status = 1 AND m.delete_flag = 0 AND m.menu_type IN (1, 2) -- 侧边栏只查询目录(1)和菜单(2)，过滤掉按钮(3) ORDER BY m.menu_parent_id, m.menu_sort
